alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:32PM MDT until June 10 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN YUMA COUNTY IN NORTHEASTERN COLORADO...NORTHEASTERN KIT CARSON COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL COLORADO...WESTERN CHEYENNE...NORTHWESTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS AND SOUTHWESTERN DUNDY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA HAS EXPIRED... The storms which prompted the warning have moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning has been allowed to expire. However gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with these thunderstorms. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Goodland. Remember, a seperate Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for western portions of Yuma and Kit Carson counties along with all of Sherman and Cheyenne counties in Kansas until 900pm MT
